known_issues: Reported that the current live/deployed Versione 16 still does not work (issue persists after deployment/build).

existing_features.title: Fix trainer login so entering the access code "12345" reliably authenticates and navigates into the trainer dashboard (Personal area) without showing the error "Unable to authenticate. Please verify your access code."

Ensure the frontend uses a backend actor that is fully ready for update calls before attempting trainer authentication (e.g., do not submit while the actor is still being fetched/initialized), and provide a deterministic initialization path so authentication is not intermittently rejected due to actor readiness/initialization issues.

Improve trainer login error handling so the UI shows the most specific available backend error message category (wrong code vs service unavailable vs authorization), and avoid mapping all non-empty errors to the same generic "Unable to authenticate" message.
Update trainer login page user-facing copy to English (labels, placeholders, button text, loading text, helper text) while preserving functionality.

projectName: Fix trainer access code login still rejecting code 12345
